LanguageData.EggKoboldFertilized.label: kobold egg (fert.)
LanguageData.EggKoboldFertilized.description: Fertilized kobold egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby 'bold. It's not very tasty at the best of times, but you'd still be better off cooking it.
LanguageData.EggKoboldUnfertilized.label: kobold egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.EggKoboldUnfertilized.description: Unfertilized kobold egg. It's not very tasty at the best of times, but you'd still be better off cooking it.
LanguageData.Leather_WildKobold.label: kobold leather
LanguageData.Leather_WildKobold.description: The tanned skin of a standard kobold, you monster.
